name: Oh My Umbrella
description:
Based on a true, real-life and personal experience, relive the encounter and melancholy of losing a previous umbrella... and finding it back. Or discover alternate endings if you choose otherwise!

Uses mouse and keyboard for controls:
1. Up/down/left/right arrows to move your character.
2. Single left-clicks to confirm your choices!

Meant for the Complete Your Game game jam on itch.io
